game.name: Destiny 2
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, In-App Purchases, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Subtitle Options, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: 데스티니 가디언즈는 끝없이 진화하는 하나의 세계에서 플레이하는 액션 MMO입니다. 언제 어디서든 친구들과 함께 무료로 플레이하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Destiny 2 is an action MMO with a single evolving world that you and your friends can join anytime, anywhere, absolutely free.

reviewHighlights.text: If you still play this game, I understand how you feel. It's hard to break away after you have sunk so much time into it. It's really not worth it. Th...
